Web Development

Front-End Development: Proficient in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, capable of building responsive and interactive websites.
Web Design: Skilled in creating visually appealing web layouts and wireframes, ensuring a seamless user experience.
JavaScript Frameworks: Familiarity with popular JavaScript frameworks/libraries such as React, Angular, or Vue.js for developing dynamic and interactive web applications.

Data Analysis

Graphics design

Graphic Design: Proficient in creating visually appealing designs using industry-standard software such as Adobe Photoshop, Illustrator, and InDesign. Branding and Identity: Skilled in developing brand identities, including logo design, typography, color schemes, and visual guidelines. Print Design: Experienced in designing print materials such as brochures, flyers, posters, business cards, and packaging. Photo Editing: Capable of retouching and enhancing photographs, adjusting colors, and manipulating images to achieve desired effects.

Communication Skills:

Effective at understanding client requirements, collaborating on design projects, and presenting ideas in a clear and professional manner.
